sentence.Network_en: It's disgraceful that they have detained him for so long.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把他扣押了这么长时间，真不光彩。

sentence.Network_en: I complained about his disgraceful behaviour.
sentence.Network_cn: 我抱怨说他的行为丢人现眼。

sentence.Network_en: I think what's happening is disgraceful.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为发生的一切很丢人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: lurk的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... cenote 天然井... disgraceful 可耻的, 不名誉的... cordiality 热诚, 真挚.
新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... patrol 巡逻队 disgraceful 不光彩的 merciful 仁慈的.
可字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 可怖〖 terrible;horrible〗 可耻〖 shameful;disgraceful〗 可待因〖 codeine〗.
lurk的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... cenote 天然井... disgraceful 可耻的, 不名誉的... cordiality 热诚, 真挚.

list.abs: Doctors like that are a disgrace to our hospitals ., 那样的医生是我们医院的一种耻辱.
not to disgrace your profession or anything . there's three weeks left in school , just give me af * * king break !不是想玷污你的职业，现在只有三个星期的时间我就毕业了，就不能让我屏蔽词语休息一下！
I would rather die than disgrace myself ., 我宁死不受辱.
体面的的英文... ... 体面的恶棍 ： an honorable villain 不体面的行为 ： disgraceful conduct 不体面的行为 ： shameful behavior.

entry.tran: （行为、情形等）丢脸的，可耻的，不名誉的
entry.def: If you say that something such as behaviour or a situation is disgraceful, you disapprove of it strongly, and feel that the person or people responsible should be ashamed of it.

example.ex: It's disgraceful that they have detained him for so long...
example.tran: 他们把他扣押了这么长时间，真不光彩。

example.ex: I complained about his disgraceful behaviour...
example.tran: 我抱怨说他的行为丢人现眼。

means.word_mean: 1. giving offense to moral sensibilities and injurious to reputation;

sentences.sentence: "the wicked rascally shameful conduct of the bankrupt"- Thackeray
"the most shocking book of its time"

means.word_mean: 2. (used of conduct or character) deserving or bringing disgrace or shame;

sentences.sentence: "Man...has written one of his blackest records as a destroyer on the oceanic islands"- Rachel Carson

auth_sentence.content: Of course "our boys" did disgraceful things.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course "our boys" did disgraceful things.

auth_sentence.content: I think it's disgraceful, absolutely disgraceful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think it's disgraceful, absolutely disgraceful.

auth_sentence.content: It's all a disgraceful Democratic cover up.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's all a disgraceful Democratic cover up.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's all a disgraceful Democratic cover up.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"分开,分离,去掉"; 2. 表示"否定,不,消失掉"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+graceful优美的→adj.可耻的, 不名誉的
dis否定,不,消失掉+honest诚实的→adj.不诚实的
dis否定,不,消失掉+incline愿意→adj.不愿的
dis否定,不,消失掉+passionate有激情的→adj.平心静气的
dis否定,不,消失掉+solute溶解→溶解开来→没有限制→放荡的
dis否定,不,消失掉+son声音+ant……的→声音不[好听]
dis分开,分离,去掉+cern搞清,确定+ment表名词→确定不同之处→有眼光

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不,消失掉+advantage优点,有利条件→n.不利, 不利条件, 缺点, 劣势
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+may能→不能做事→沮丧;参考:五月能种粮食,所以叫May
dis否定,不,消失掉+order顺序→没有顺序
dis否定,不,消失掉+proof证实→不证实→反证
dis分开,分离,去掉+course课程,教程→分解课程→论述→论文
dis分开+play=ply重叠→打开折叠→显示出来
dis分开,分离,去掉+affect感情→感情分开→疏远
dis分开,分离,去掉+burse钱包→从钱包中分出→支出
dis分开,分离,去掉+crimin分辨→ate→分辩开
dis分开,分离,去掉+cuss敲打→把[问题]分开敲→讨论
dis分开,分离,去掉+miss送→分开送出→解散
dis分开,分离,去掉+part部分→分成部分→分开
dis分开,分离,去掉+pens花费+e→分开花费→分配[财富等]
dis分开,分离,去掉+semin种子+ate表动词→散布[种子]
dis分开,分离,去掉+tend伸展,拉→分开伸展→膨胀
dis分开,分离,去掉+tract拉→把[心]拉开→分心
dis不+adapt使适应→v.使不适应
dis否定,不,消失掉+appear出现→不出现→消失
dis否定,不,消失掉+arm武装→去掉武装
dis否定,不,消失掉+courage勇气→v.使失去勇气
dis否定,不,消失掉+cover盖→把盖揭开→发现
dis不+gust美味→n. 厌恶,恶心 v. 使厌恶
dis否定,不,消失掉+honour尊敬→毫无尊敬→丢脸
dis否定,不,消失掉+like喜爱→不喜爱
dis否定,不,消失掉+organize组织→解散组织
dis否定,不,消失掉+pel推→推开→驱除

means.word_mean: 可耻的,丢脸的,不光彩的

sentences.en: An honourable death is better than a disgraceful life.
There’s litter everywhere. It’s absolutely disgraceful.
